description: Submits a message to the Amazon Q in Connect session.

parameters.name: assistantId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q in Connect assistant.

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q in Connect session.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The message data to submit to the Amazon Q in Connect session. The message input value. text (dict) --- The message data in text type. value (string) --- The value of the message data in text type.

nested_params.name: text
nested_params.description: The message data in text type.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: The value of the message data in text type.

parameters.name: conversationContext
parameters.description: The conversation context before the Amazon Q in Connect session. The self service conversation history before the Amazon Q in Connect session. (dict) --- The conversation history data to included in conversation context data before the Amazon Q in Connect session. The number of turn of the conversation history data. inputTranscript (string) --- The input transcript of the conversation history data. botResponse (string) --- The bot response of the conversation history data.

nested_params.name: selfServiceConversationHistory
nested_params.description: The self service conversation history before the Amazon Q in Connect session.

nested_params.name: turnNumber
nested_params.description: The number of turn of the conversation history data.

nested_params.name: inputTranscript
nested_params.description: The input transcript of the conversation history data.

nested_params.name: botResponse
nested_params.description: The bot response of the conversation history data.

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: The configuration of the SendMessage request. generateFillerMessage (boolean) --- Generates a filler response when tool selection is QUESTION.

nested_params.name: generateFillerMessage
nested_params.description: Generates a filler response when tool selection is QUESTION.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. If not provided, the AWS SDK populates this field.For more information about idempotency, see Making retries safe with idempotent APIs. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: requestMessageId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the submitted message.

nested_items.name: configuration
nested_items.description: The configuration of the SendMessage request.

nested_items.name: generateFillerMessage
nested_items.description: Generates a filler response when tool selection is QUESTION.

nested_items.name: nextMessageToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next message, used by GetNextMessage.
